Santa Clara CA JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode Salary Currency Salary Job Description 2026 - Summer S26 Full Stack AI Applications Intern - PEY 177728B Co-op Position Toronto, ON Canada 4 months In-Person CAD Salary Not Available, 0 Major List Full Stack AI Applications Intern - PEY opportunity available here: https://job- boards.greenhouse.io/tenstorrentuniversity/jobs/4532863007 Tenstorrent is leading the industry on cutting-edge AI technology, revolutionizing performance expectations, ease of use, and cost efficiency. With AI redefining the computing paradigm, solutions must evolve to unify innovations in software models, compilers, platforms, networking, and semiconductors. Our diverse team of technologists have developed a high performance RISC-V CPU from scratch, and share a passion for AI and a deep desire to build the best AI platform possible. We value collaboration, curiosity, and a commitment to solving hard problems. We are growing our team and looking for contributors of all seniorities. Tenstorrent is leading the industry on cutting-edge AI technology, revolutionizing performance expectations, ease of use, and cost efficiency. With AI redefining the computing paradigm, solutions must evolve to unify innovations in software models, compilers, platforms, networking, and semiconductors. Our diverse team of technologists have developed a high performance RISC-V CPU from scratch, and share a passion for AI and a deep desire to build the best AI platform possible. We value collaboration, curiosity, and a commitment to solving hard problems. We are growing our team and looking for contributors of all seniorities. As a Full Stack AI Applications Intern, your role will focus on building AI application demos such as chat-style interfaces and multi-modal applications, developing end-to-end systems that integrate UI, backend, and ML models, and showcasing the power of Tenstorrent hardware through cutting-edge features like RAG and AI agents. Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Special Application Instructions APPLICATION LINK: https://job-boards.greenhouse.io/tenstorrentuniversity/jobs/4532863007 Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
